ngiemboon: Pɔ́gɔ̀ lɔɔn ńjÿó ncù wɔɔn mbà pɔ́gɔ̀ ge cʉ́ʼ pandù nnɛ́.
en: If we win this war, we will be free.

ngiemboon: Kaa pàga káŋ, ńtÿɔ́gɔ ndùm kúmbù.
en: Carry the dish to place it above the soup tureen.

ngiemboon: Ndùmommóléjÿo aa těen ńjÿó mmó ńzẅɛ́ɛ wɔ́.
en: When the gourmand eats, he never gets satisfied.

ngiemboon: Mé lɔɔn ńcúa ɔ́, ɔ̀ pɔ́ɔn létsɔ́ʼ ndùndú ná né mèŋ.
en: If you get hit, don't blame me.

ngiemboon: Tâm kɔʼɔ́ ńgwɔ́ ndùŋ mvfò nyìŋ létóo ndá cúʼtè.
en: Tam was the first to be at the meeting.
